feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
